title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the central bank would increase its administered interest rates or increase interest on reserves.
The response states that the central bank would increase its administered interest rates or increase interest on reserves.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that there will be an increase in the flow of international financial capital into Noralandia and/or does not explain that international investors will seek higher returns on financial capital in Noralandia.

The response states that there will be an increase in the flow of international financial capital into Noralandia and explains that international investors will seek higher returns on financial capital in Noralandia.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Noralandia’s currency will appreciate and/or does not explain that there will be an increase in the demand for Noralandia’s currency (or a decrease in the supply of Noralandia’s currency).

The response states that Noralandia’s currency will appreciate and explains that there will be an increase in the demand for Noralandia’s currency (or a decrease in the supply of Noralandia’s currency).
